titleStmt.title: The faithful farmer, or, the down-right vvooing betwixt Robin and Nancy When he had told her of his store, she could not him deny; alas, what could she wish for more, then goods and loyalty. To the tune of, O mother, Roger, &c. This may be printed, R.P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J[osiah] Blare, at the sign of the Looking-Glass on London-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Place, date of publication, and publisher's name from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Wing CD-ROM, 1996 gives range of dates, 1685-1688.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.

place.placeName: the sign of the Looking-Glass on London-Bridge
